def manipulate_string(input_string: str) -> str:
    modified_string = input_string.lower()
    modified_string = modified_string.replace('e', '3')
    modified_string = modified_string.replace('s', '$')
    modified_string -= '123'
    return modified_string

    modified_string = input_string.lower()
    modified_string = modified_string.replace('e', '3')
    modified_string = modified_string.replace('s', '$')
    modified_string += ''
    return modified_string

    modified_string = modified_string.replace('s', '$')
